channel.title: [Pi] Intensity-X Development Thread. [Pi] Pk Server ~ [Need Coders]
channel.description:
Need developer's, scroll all the way down for more information.
Domain: Intensity-x.org/forums/
Vps: I will get a 2gb vps in 2 days.
I have done some forums coding & stuff, i am using mybb.
[center]Update Log[/center] [center][code]- Added Fullscreen - Fixed Guthix Altar's. - Fixed Hover glitch. - Added Ingame Highscores (Interface Still needs work) - Removed money pouch, Not neaded, money is spawnable. - Added ALL Unspawnwable id's.[/code][/center]
Added InGame Highscores. -Still need's some work. [img]http://i.imgur.com/awGKw.png[/img]
Skills Tab - Dung level needs to be added. [img]http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/8266/d2d74b85991e479ea95e9cf.png[/img]
Tele interface. - Need's to be improved. [img]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/1289/76f5c2ce669049349cf2b74.png[/img]
Color cash. - Want to remove the color and have it at yellow again. [img]http://i.imgur.com/hjOoo.png[/img]
Super donator spot. - Need's to be improved. [img]http://i.imgur.com/hMwJn.png[/img]
Quest tab - Need's to be reorganized & redone. [img]http://i.imgur.com/jbfUJ.png[/img]
A donator point shop. Need another donator shop & berserker ring (i) model fixed. [img]http://i.imgur.com/UJHkd.png[/img]
Overload animation. - Makes your prayer down by 10 every time it hit's you, which is suppose to effect your hp instead of your prayer points. -Needs to be fixed. [img]http://i.imgur.com/DsIAL.png[/img]
Correct models. - No improvement required. [img]http://i.imgur.com/gnpg7.png[/img]
Shop interface. [img]http://i.imgur.com/Qgey5.png[/img]
Npc that buy's artifacts. [img]http://i.imgur.com/5zM5s.png[/img]
Things i want to add. 1.
EP system that drops Statuettes:
Armadyl Saradomin Bandos Ancient
Other artifacts:
Bandos scrimshaw Ancient psaltery bridge Zamorak medallion
The higher the EP the better EP drop you get & sometimes ONLY rare with EP is 80+ you get like vesta or statues.
A Npc that buys EP drops for Pkp (Not including the vesta & statues).
2. TriviaBot.
Quest tab option to turn it off or on.
A bot that ask a question and if you get it right you get pkp, the longer you take to answer it the less pkp you will get. This would be the whole server, so if whoever answers it first get the pkp. If no one answers it within 1 minute, it starts another question.
::Answer
3. Idknameofthebot
Quest tab option to turn it off or on.
It's a bot that says something or what like. Ex: Whoever types this first gets (random from 1-100 pkp): 3233f9r2mi3ir9eqw- Then player who types it first gets the random amount of pkp.
::Typed
4. Clan
Working clan.
Commands.
::Kick (user) ::Mute (user) ::UnMute (user) ::ban (user) ::unban (user)
5. Autodonation
Donate for pkp points, they pay through paypal and server automatically gives them the pkp by doing ::claim
6. Vote for Vote Points & use them at the Vote Point Shop
I do want to add more, if you know anything good to add comment on here & if i think it's a good idea i'll add it to this development thread.
So this is my first Rsps development Thread, i've hosted server's before and coded some to learn but not with anyone, just bymself.
I've been coding since i was about 13 and now im 16, i haven't learned a WHOLE bunch but i know how to program some java & edit, i'm not such an amazing java programmer but i wanna learn and that's another reason i'm doing this development for my rsps
I found a base to use, if you want to help me out. Post below and tell me what you can do, Also you must have a Skype for contact.

item.description:
@All_Time_Low wrote:

Need developer’s, scroll all the way down for more information.

Domain: Intensity-x.org/forums/

Vps: I will get a 2gb vps in 2 days.

I have done some forums coding & stuff, i am using mybb.

[center]Update Log[/center]
[center][code]- Added Fullscreen

  • Fixed Guthix Altar’s.
  • Fixed Hover glitch.
  • Added Ingame Highscores (Interface Still needs work)
  • Removed money pouch, Not neaded, money is spawnable.
  • Added ALL Unspawnwable id’s.[/code][/center]

Added InGame Highscores.
-Still need’s some work.

awGKw.png770×533

Skills Tab

  • Dung level needs to be added.

Tele interface.

  • Need’s to be improved.

Color cash.

  • Want to remove the color and have it at yellow again.

Super donator spot.

  • Need’s to be improved.
    hMwJn.png768×532

Quest tab

  • Need’s to be reorganized & redone.

A donator point shop.
Need another donator shop & berserker ring (i) model fixed.

UJHkd.png767×531

Overload animation.

  • Makes your prayer down by 10 every time it hit’s you, which is suppose to effect your hp instead of your prayer points.
    -Needs to be fixed.
    DsIAL.png768×535

Correct models.

  • No improvement required.

Shop interface.

Qgey5.png765×531

Npc that buy’s artifacts.

5zM5s.png765×531

Things i want to add.
1.

EP system that drops
Statuettes:

Armadyl
Saradomin
Bandos
Ancient

Other artifacts:

Bandos scrimshaw
Ancient psaltery bridge
Zamorak medallion

The higher the EP the better EP drop you get & sometimes ONLY rare with EP is 80+ you get like vesta or statues.

A Npc that buys EP drops for Pkp (Not including the vesta & statues).

  1. TriviaBot.

Quest tab option to turn it off or on.

A bot that ask a question and if you get it right you get pkp, the longer you take to answer it the less pkp you will get.
This would be the whole server, so if whoever answers it first get the pkp.
If no one answers it within 1 minute, it starts another question.

::Answer

  1. Idknameofthebot

Quest tab option to turn it off or on.

It’s a bot that says something or what like.
Ex: Whoever types this first gets (random from 1-100 pkp): 3233f9r2mi3ir9eqw-
Then player who types it first gets the random amount of pkp.

::Typed

  1. Clan

Working clan.

Commands.

::Kick (user)
::Mute (user)
::UnMute (user)
::ban (user)
::unban (user)

  1. Autodonation

Donate for pkp points, they pay through paypal and server automatically gives them the pkp by doing ::claim

  1. Vote for Vote Points & use them at the Vote Point Shop

I do want to add more, if you know anything good to add comment on here & if i think it’s a good idea i’ll add it to this development thread.

So this is my first Rsps development Thread, i’ve hosted server’s before and coded some to learn but not with anyone, just bymself.

I’ve been coding since i was about 13 and now im 16, i haven’t learned a WHOLE bunch but i know how to program some java & edit, i’m not such an amazing java programmer but i wanna learn and that’s another reason i’m doing this development for my rsps

I found a base to use, if you want to help me out.
